srm_field

Template class to model the fields in a register.

A field has ‘n’ bits, multiple reset values and an access policy.

Summary
srm_field
Template class to model the fields in a register.
Class Hierarchy
srm_base_field
srm_field
Class Declaration
class srm_field#( type  T  =  int ) extends srm_base_field
Initialization
newCreate a new instance of a field.
Converter
data_2_bytesConverts the template data type into a list of bytes.

Model Access
setSets the value of the field in the model.

Model+Design Access
writeWrite the field in the design and model.

__initializeInitialize the state from the current value.

Initialization

new

function new( string  name,
srm_base_reg  parent,
int  n_bits,
int  lsb_pos,
bit  volatile )

Create a new instance of a field.

name is the name of the field.  parent is the pointer to the register to which the field belongs.  nbits is the size of the field in bits.  lsb_pos is the least significant position

Converter

data_2_bytes

virtual function srm_data_t data_2_bytes( const ref  T  data )

Converts the template data type into a list of bytes.

Format is {byte_n, byte_n_1, ..., byte_1, byte_0} = [msb..lsb] Note that the lsb of field corresponds to lsb of byte0.

bytes_2_data

virtual function T bytes_2_data( const ref  srm_data_t  bytes )

Converts the list of bytes into template data type.

Format is [msb...lsb] = {byte_n, byte_n_1, ..., byte_1, byte_0} Note that the lsb of byte 0 corresponds to lsb of the field.

Model Access

set

virtual function void set( T  data )

Sets the value of the field in the model.

get

virtual function T get()

Get the value of the field.

get_bytes

virtual function srm_data_t get_bytes()

Get the model value as a list of bytes.

set_bytes

virtual function void set_bytes( const ref  srm_data_t  bytes )

Set the value of the model by a list of bytes.

Model+Design Access

write

virtual task write( srm_base_handle  handle,
T  data )

Write the field in the design and model.

Generate write with correct byte enable set for the field.  Also other field values are set to the value from the model.  It is possible to make data as const ref but then I cannot pass literal constants.

read

virtual task read( srm_base_handle  handle,
output  T  data )

Read the contents of the field.

A read to the parent register is issued with the correct byte enables.  The field data is them stripped and compared to the model data.

Reset

set_reset_value

virtual function void set_reset_value( T  value,
input  string  kind )

Sets the reset value of the field under different kinds of reset.

value is the reset value.  kind is the type of reset.  For example hard, bist, soft etc.

get_reset_value

virtual function T get_reset_value( string  kind )

Get the reset value of the field under different kinds of reset.

kind is the type of reset.  For example hard, bist, soft etc.

reset

virtual function void reset( string  kind )

Reset the field with the specified reset.

kind is the type of reset.  For example hard, bist, soft etc.  Updates the field data with the reset value.

Private

__initialize

virtual function void __initialize( srm_base_field  obj )

Initialize the state from the current value.

Used by the framework to clone array register entries.

virtual class srm_base_field
Base class for a field in a register.
